CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 30, 1947, pg. 10, reads: "Pittsburgh Weddings - Repeating marriage vows recently where the couples pictured above...fourth: Sgt. and Mrs. James Cotton... - All photos by Harris." Portion of accompanying article reads: "Smith - Cotton. Miss Aleria [illegible]... Mr. and Mrs. [il.]... married to Sgt... charming... formed by... couple honey..."
TitMainTitle: Groom James A. Cotten wearing military uniform, and bride Oteria Smith Cotten wearing light colored suit and corsage, posed in home at 93 Lafferty Avenue, Beltzhoover
